description: How deployer reputation scores are computed. Scores range 0-100.

factors.name: Rug rate
factors.description: Percentage of past tokens that rugged. 100% rug rate = -40 points.

factors.name: Launch count
factors.description: More launches = more data = more trust. Caps at 10 launches.

factors.name: Average token lifespan
factors.description: Longer average lifespan = tokens that don't die fast = more trustworthy.

factors.name: Connected wallets
factors.description: More wallet connections = more suspicious clustering behavior.

factors.name: Recency decay
factors.description: Stale deployers lose trust over time. Resets on new activity.
